text: Lithium aspartate is a salt of aspartic acid and lithium. Its chemical formula is C4H6LiNO4. It is sometimes sold as a dietary supplement which is used in small doses to treat some diseases. However, there are no studies that support the efficiency, or safety, of lithium aspartate. It is not approved by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration to treat any disease. Category:Lithium compounds
title: Lithium aspartate
